Name: Budget Constraint
Description: Ensure total project cost does not exceed budget

Name: Sprint Duration Limit
Description: Enforce sprint length between 1 and 4 weeks

Name: Team Capacity Constraint
Description: Assigned story points per sprint must not exceed capacity

Name: Priority Requirement
Description: All high-priority features must be planned for release

Name: Developer Availability
Description: Assign tasks only to available employees

Name: Sprint Overlap Avoidance
Description: Prevent a team from being in overlapping sprints

Name: Dependency Constraint
Description: User stories must respect epic-story dependencies

Name: Blocker Resolution Time
Description: Blockers must be resolved within 2 days

Name: Backlog Grooming Frequency
Description: Product Backlog updated at least once weekly

Name: Release Date Adherence
Description: Actual release dates must match planned dates

Name: Stakeholder Engagement
Description: Collect stakeholder feedback each sprint review
